decoworld.model.world.quests

Class QuestEvent<Event>

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.quests.QuestEvent<Event>
  • Type Parameters:
    Event - 

    public class QuestEvent<Event>
extends java.lang.Object
    QuestEvent is a wrapper for any objects that are considered "events". It allows for time limits and counters to be associated with a given event.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QuestEvent(Event event)
      Primary (actual) constructor for event that occurs once with no time delay
      QuestEvent(Event event, double time)
      Constructor for an event that keeps track of time as a condition
      QuestEvent(Event event, int count)
      Constructor for event that occurs a number of times.
      QuestEvent(Event event, int count, double time)
      Constructor for event that needs to occur "count" times in some period of time.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCount()
      Return the number of times this event must occur
      Event getEvent()
      Return this QuestEvent's actual event
      double getTime()
      Return the time remaining for this event
      void setCount(int c)
      Specify a new value for count
      void setTime(double t)
      Specify a new value for time
